Verify PGP signatures plugin
Last Published: 2015-05-06  | Version: 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

pgpverify:check

Full name:

com.github.s4u.plugins:pgpverify-maven-plugin:1.1.0-SNAPSHOT:check

Description:

Check PGP signature of dependency.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: validate.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
pgpKeyServer String 1.0.0 PGP public key server address.
Default value is: hkp://pool.sks-keyservers.net.
User property is: pgpverify.keyserver.
pgpKeysCachePath File 1.0.0 The directory for storing cached PGP public keys.
Default value is: ${settings.localRepository}/pgpkeys-cache.
User property is: pgpverify.keycache.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
failNoSignature boolean 1.1.0 Fail the build if some of dependency hasn't signature.
Default value is: false.
User property is: pgpverify.failNoSignature.
keysMapLocation String 1.1.0

Specifies the location of the properties file which contains the map of dependency to pgp key.

The syntax of each line of properties file is:

groupId:artifactId:version=pgpKey

You can use * in groupId, artefactId and version as wildcard.

pgpKey must be written as hex number starting with 0x. You can use * or any for match any pgp key.

You can also omit version and artifactId which means any value for those fields.


User property is: pgpverify.keysMapLocation.
scope String 1.0.0 Scope used to build dependency list.
Default value is: test.
User property is: pgpverify.scope.
verifyPomFiles boolean 1.1.0 Verify pom files also.
Default value is: true.
User property is: pgpverify.verifyPomFiles.

Parameter Details

failNoSignature:

Fail the build if some of dependency hasn't signature.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: pgpverify.failNoSignature
  • Default: false

keysMapLocation:

Specifies the location of the properties file which contains the map of dependency to pgp key.

The syntax of each line of properties file is:

groupId:artifactId:version=pgpKey

You can use * in groupId, artefactId and version as wildcard.

pgpKey must be written as hex number starting with 0x. You can use * or any for match any pgp key.

You can also omit version and artifactId which means any value for those fields.

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: pgpverify.keysMapLocation

pgpKeyServer:

PGP public key server address.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: pgpverify.keyserver
  • Default: hkp://pool.sks-keyservers.net

pgpKeysCachePath:

The directory for storing cached PGP public keys.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: pgpverify.keycache
  • Default: ${settings.localRepository}/pgpkeys-cache

scope:

Scope used to build dependency list.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: pgpverify.scope
  • Default: test

verifyPomFiles:

Verify pom files also.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.1.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: pgpverify.verifyPomFiles
  • Default: true
